User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches auth.uid).

email.description: The email address of the user.

Income.title: Income
Income.description: Represents a single income entry for a user.

source.description: The source of the income (e.g., Salary).

date.description: Timestamp of when the income was received.

Expense.title: Expense
Expense.description: Represents a single expense entry for a user.

date.description: Timestamp of when the expense was incurred.

name.description: The name of the expense category.

/users/{userId}/incomes/{incomeId}.description: Stores income entries for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/expenses/{expenseId}.description: Stores expense entries for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/expenseCategories/{categ.description: Stores expense categories defined by a specific user.
